name: Blaster_Support.Electricity_Manipulation
display_help: Electricity Manipulation empowers you with various electrical melee attack and support powers. Electricity Manipulation powers can drain foes' Endurance and temporarily halt their Endurance recovery. Some powers return a portion of drained Endurance to you.

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Electricity_Manipulation.Electric_Fence
powers.display_help: Surrounds and Immobilizes a single target in an Electric Fence. Deals some damage over time and slowly drains some Endurance. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info: 5 ticks of 12.51 energy damage over 8.2s on target
5 ticks of 21.21 energy damage over 8.2s on target
4 ticks of -1.00 endurance over 6.2s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 15s on target
7.70% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.67s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Electricity_Manipulation.Charged_Brawl
powers.display_help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch. Charged Brawl can drain some Endurance from the target and may overload their synapses, leaving them writhing for a moment. A portion of drained Endurance may be returned to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release them. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 20.00% chance for 3.0 sleep for 11.92s on target after 0.25s delay
20.00% chance for 3.0 sleep for 2s on target after 0.25s delay
5.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.33s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Electricity_Manipulation.Lightning_Field
powers.display_help: While active, you emit a storm of electricity that constantly damages all nearby foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Electricity_Manipulation.Havok_Punch
powers.display_help: The Havoc Punch is a slower attack than Charged Brawl, but makes up for it with a greater damage. Havoc Punch can may knock down targets, drain some Endurance from your target, or even overload their synapses, leaving them writhing for a moment. A portion of the drained Endurance may be given back to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release them. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Sleep, -End, Knock back

display_info: 50.00% chance for 3.0 sleep for 17.88s on target after 0.25s delay
50.00% chance for 3.0 sleep for 2s on target after 0.25s delay
30.00% chance for 1.6 magnitude knock on target
30.00% chance for 1.6 magnitude knock on target
9.90% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Electricity_Manipulation.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 100.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Electricity_Manipulation.Lightning_Clap
powers.display_help: You can channel the raw force of a thunderbolt through you knocking enemies back and potentially disorienting them. This electrical energy also causes you to regenerate health and recover endurance very quickly for a short time. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 50.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 9.54s on target
50.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target
30.00% chance for 2.1 magnitude knock on target
2.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.73s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Electricity_Manipulation.Thunder_Strike
powers.display_help: A massive attack. You smash your foes with all the power of a lightning bolt. The pummeled victim takes tremendous damage and may be Disoriented. Any nearby foes may be knocked down and take some damage from the shockwave. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee (AoE), High DMG(Smash, Energy), Foe Disorient, Knockback

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Electricity_Manipulation.Power_Sink
powers.display_help: Power Sink leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 4.80% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.53s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Electricity_Manipulation.Shocking_Grasp
powers.display_help: Shocking Grasp causes the target to be overcome with a violent electrical charge. The seized target is left writhing in agony and is unable to defend themselves. Shocking Grasp also drains a significant amount of Endurance from the target and may return a portion of it to you. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow
